questions.questionTitle: Who most likely are the speakers?
What problem does the woman have?
anwers: Her fax machine is not working well.
She needs the agreement by noon.

questions.questionTitle: What will the man probably do next?

script:
� I'll fax a copy of the agreement to you right away.
� Our fax machine's been kind of spotty lately. Would it be possible to send it as an e-mail attachment? I'll print it out, sign it, and then mail it back.
� That would work, except that we need it by noon tomorrow. Will it get here in time if you send it snail mail?
� It will if I send it overnight delivery. They guarantee a noon arrival.
